name: ErrorGroupServiceClient
title: Google
Cloud
ErrorReporting
V1beta1
ErrorGroupServiceClient
description: Service for retrieving and updating individual error groups.

methods.name: group_path
title: Google
Cloud
ErrorReporting
V1beta1
ErrorGroupServiceClient.group_path
methods.description: Returns a fully-qualified group resource name string.

methods.name: match_project_from_group_name
title: Google
Cloud
ErrorReporting
V1beta1
ErrorGroupServiceClient.match_project_from_group_name
methods.description: Parses the project from a group resource.

methods.name: match_group_from_group_name
title: Google
Cloud
ErrorReporting
V1beta1
ErrorGroupServiceClient.match_group_from_group_name
methods.description: Parses the group from a group resource.

params.name: service_path
params.description: The domain name of the API remote host.

params.name: port
params.description: The port on which to connect to the remote host.

params.name: channel
params.description: A Channel object through which to make calls.

params.name: chan_creds
params.description: A ChannelCredentials for the setting up the RPC client.

params.name: client_config
params.description:
A Hash for call options for each method. See
Google::Gax#construct_settings for the structure of
this data. Falls back to the default config if not specified
or the specified config is missing data points.

params.name: timeout
params.description: The default timeout, in seconds, for calls made through this client.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/error_reporting/v1beta1/error_group_service_client"

ErrorGroupServiceClient = Google::Cloud::ErrorReporting::V1beta1::ErrorGroupServiceClient

error_group_service_client = ErrorGroupServiceClient.new
formatted_group_name = ErrorGroupServiceClient.group_path("[PROJECT]", "[GROUP]")
response = error_group_service_client.get_group(formatted_group_name)

params.name: group_name
params.description:
[Required] The group resource name. Written as projects/projectID/groups/group_name. Call groupStats.list to return a list of groups belonging to this project.

Example: projects/my-project-123/groups/my-group

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.

methods.name: update_group
title: Google
Cloud
ErrorReporting
V1beta1
ErrorGroupServiceClient#update_group
methods.description: Replace the data for the specified group. Fails if the group does not exist.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/error_reporting/v1beta1/error_group_service_client"

ErrorGroup = Google::Devtools::Clouderrorreporting::V1beta1::ErrorGroup
ErrorGroupServiceClient = Google::Cloud::ErrorReporting::V1beta1::ErrorGroupServiceClient

error_group_service_client = ErrorGroupServiceClient.new
group = ErrorGroup.new
response = error_group_service_client.update_group(group)

params.name: group
params.description: [Required] The group which replaces the resource on the server.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.
